title: ValueError: threshold must be numeric and non-NAN, try sys.maxsize for untruncated representation
body:
I'm new to this repo.

Performed:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3.git
cd keras-yolo3
mkdir models
cd models
wget https://pjreddie.com/media/files/yolov3.weights
cd ..
wget https://images.pexels.com/photos/1108099/pexels-photo-1108099.jpeg dog.jpg
python yolo3_one_file_to_detect_them_all.py -w models/yolo3.weights -i dog.jpg
```

Got output:

> Using TensorFlow backend.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Traceback (most recent call last):                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            File "yolo3_one_file_to_detect_them_all.py", line 10, in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              np.set_printoptions(threshold=np.nan)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     File "/home/nlp/amit/anaconda2/envs/piano2/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/core/arrayprint.py", line 246, in set_printoptions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               floatmode, legacy)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        File "/home/nlp/amit/anaconda2/envs/piano2/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/core/arrayprint.py", line 93, in _make_options_dict                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              raise ValueError("threshold must be numeric and non-NAN, try "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ValueError: threshold must be numeric and non-NAN, try sys.maxsize for untruncated representation

What am I doing wrong? I followed your README.
